Package gov.nih.nlm.nls.lvg.Lib

Contains LVG general library classes of BitMaskBase, Category, Gender, Inflection, Configuration, CombineRecords, OutputFilter, Flow, GlobalBehavior, LexItem, LexItemComparator.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BitMaskBase
    This class is the base class for Bit Mask operation.
    Category
    This Category class extends BitMaskBase class and performs as LVG category.
    CatInfl
    This class provides an object contains category and inflection.
    CatInflKey
    This class provides key using category and inflection for LexItem.
    CombineRecords
    This class provides methods of combining Lvg output records by specifying different rules.
    Configuration
    This class provides a way of storing and retrieving configurations through a configuration object.
    CoreNormObj
    This class provides the base object of Unicode Core Norm.
    Flow
    This class provides methods of combining Lvg output records by specifying different rules.
    Gender
    This Gender class extends BitMaskBase class and performs as LVG gender.
    GlobalBehavior
    This class provides LVg Global Behavior related definition and methods.
    Inflection
    This Inflection class extends BitMaskBase class and performs as LVG Inflection.
    InputFilter
    This class provides methods of Lvg input filter functions.
    LexItem
    This class provides the base element of LVG, LexItem.
    LexItemComparator<T>
    This class performs a comparator for LexItems.
    LvgFlowSpecificOption
    This class provides a class for all Lvg Flow specific options.
    LvgOutputOption
    This class provides a class for all Lvg options related variables.
    OutputFilter
    This class provides methods of Lvg output filter functions.
    Tag
    This Tag class extends BitMaskBase class and performs as a tagger in LexItem.
    TermCatCatKey
    This class provides key for derivational LexItem used in recursively derivational flow.
    TermCatInflKey
    This class provides key for LexItem using term, category, and inflections This overrides the hashcode() and equals() for using hashtable and hashSet.
    TermCatKey
    This class provides key for derivational LexItem used in recursively derivational flow.

Package gov.nih.nlm.nls.lvg.Lib Description

Contains LVG general library classes of BitMaskBase, Category, Gender, Inflection, Configuration, CombineRecords, OutputFilter, Flow, GlobalBehavior, LexItem, LexItemComparator. This package serves as a library for Lexical Tools and is not intended to be used by end users directly. End users may skip this package.

This library can be categorized as follows:

  • BitMask Operations:
    • BitMaskBase
    • Category
    • Gender
    • Inflection
    • Flow

  • System Options:
    • Configuration
    • CombineRecords
    • OutputFilter
    • GlobalBehavior

  • LexItem Related:
    • LexItem
    • LexItemComparator
Since:
2002
